title: With TechMVerse Launch, Tech Mahindra Drives into The Metaverse - News18
content: With TechMVerse Launch, Tech Mahindra Drives into The Metaverse  News18
description: The company said that its world-class network and infrastructure capabilities, as well as its foundational technological capabilities such as pervasive AI, Blockchain, 5G, AR, VR, and Quantum Computing will be used to build B2B use cases across sectors to transform customer experience and deliver real business outcomes.
